parts.name: part:@sanity/visual-diff/visualizers
parts.description: Definitions on how to render diffs for given types, based on change summaries

parts.name: part:@sanity/visual-diff/summarizers
parts.description: Rules for producing change summaries. These are consumed by the differs.

parts.name: part:@sanity/visual-diff
parts.description: A component which takes two documents and renders a diff
